subject: Boxing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bivins was a heavyweight boxer who in the 1940s and ’50s beat eight future world champions but, to his lasting regret, never got a shot at the title himself.
snippet: Mr. Bivins was a heavyweight boxer who in the 1940s and ’50s beat eight future world champions but, to his lasting regret, never got a shot at the title himself.
